text:
Does anyone have any experience with custom workflow actions and passing outputs back to workflows. Copying the output to a property always fails and in the workflow shows as missing property.
`{"statusCode": 200, "outputFields": {"email-validation": "valid"}}`
That's the response and I've triple check its the same name.

Thanks for the info - when you said they were going to provide a way to specify the client version, is that in reference to the workflow automations/custom code actions?

After trying to build an action that used custom objects associations, I found that discrepancy very quickly. The package namespace is different between the current version and the one in the workflow code actions.
